notes: Lazy-S string per OCIMF hose guidance (https://www.ocimf.org/publications/offshore-marine/guide-to-manufacturing-and-purchasing-hoses-for-offshore-moorings)
Chinese Lantern riser layout using API 17K bonded flexible pipe (https://www.api.org/products-and-services/standards)
PLEM valve skid design per ASME process piping (https://www.asme.org/codes-standards/find-codes-standards/b31-3-process-piping)
